title: Number of operable nuclear reactor plants by country 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of reactors for 30 number of Countrys.
The Number of reactors is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Iran.
There is a difference of 96.0 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Iran.
